notes: First generation as separate RAM brand (split from Dodge 2009). Major redesign with coil spring rear suspension. EcoDiesel V6 added 2014. 8-speed automatic from 2013. Ram Box storage system. EcoDiesel requires diesel-trained technicians. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram pickup article, January 2025 revision.

Heavy-duty Ram with Cummins 6.7L diesel. Manual transmission available. Mega Cab configuration with extended cab space. Towing capacity up to 35,100 lbs. 6.4L Hemi replaced 5.7L in 2014. Heavy-duty diesel requires specialized service expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram pickup article, January 2025 revision.

Rebadged Fiat Dobl√≤. Compact commercial van competing with Ford Transit Connect. Available as cargo or passenger (Wagon) variant. Discontinued 2022. Data sourced from Wikipedia Ram ProMaster City article, January 2025 revision.
